Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickmasterluke --A nice simple sword
sp=script.Parent
r=game:service("RunService") debris=game:GetService("Debris") check=true
anims={"RightSlash","LeftSlash","OverHeadSwing"}
basedamage=2 slashdamage=14 swingdamage=18 cooldown=.7 damage=basedamage
function waitfor(parent,name) print("Waiting for",name) while parent:FindFirstChild(name)==nil do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end print("Found",name) return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
sword=waitfor(sp,"Handle") sparkles=waitfor(sword,"Sparkles") waitfor(sp,"Taunting") waitfor(sp,"RunAnim") waitfor(sp,"AnimToRun") waitfor(sp,"MouseSide") SlashSound=waitfor(sword,"SlashSound") UnsheathSound=waitfor(sword,"UnsheathSound") ClashSound=waitfor(sword,"ClashSound") sp.Taunting.Value=false
function blow(hit) if hit.Parent~=nil then local humanoid=hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter=sp.Parent local vPlayer=game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum=vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid~=nil then if hum~=nil and humanoid~=hum and hum.Health>0 and humanoid.Health>0 then local right_arm=vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm~=nil then local joint=right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint~=nil and (joint.Part0==sword or joint.Part1==sword) then sparkles.Enabled=true tagHumanoid(humanoid,vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(.3) sparkles.Enabled=false end end end elseif hit.Parent.className=="Tool" and clashdebounce then clashdebounce=false sparkles.Enabled=true ClashSound.Pitch=.75+(math.random()*.5) ClashSound:Play() wait(.3) sparkles.Enabled=false clashdebounce=true end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid,player) for i,v in ipairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local creator_tag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value=player creator_tag.Name="creator" creator_tag.Parent=humanoid debris:AddItem(creator_tag,1) end
check=true function onActivated() if check and not sp.Taunting.Value then check=false local character=sp.Parent; local humanoid=character.Humanoid if humanoid==nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end SlashSound:play() local newanim=(sp.MouseSide.Value=="Left" and "LeftSlash") or (sp.MouseSide.Value=="Center" and "OverHeadSwing") or "RightSlash" sp.AnimToRun.Value=newanim wait() sp.RunAnim.Value=not sp.RunAnim.Value if newanim=="OverHeadSwing" then damage=swingdamage else damage=slashdamage end wait(cooldown) damage=basedamage if newanim=="OverHeadSwing" then wait(.4) end check=true end end
function onEquipped() UnsheathSound:play() sparkles.Enabled=false end
sp.Activated:connect(onActivated) sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
connection=sword.Touched:connect(blow)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
local sp=script.Parent
taunting=false
cursors={ Left=108119671, Right=108119709, Center=108119490, }
function waitfor(parent,name) while parent:FindFirstChild(name)==nil do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
sword=waitfor(sp,"Handle") waitfor(sp,"Taunting") waitfor(sp,"RunAnim") waitfor(sp,"AnimToRun") waitfor(sp,"MouseSide") --[[local contentprovider=Game:GetService("ContentProvider") for _,v in pairs(cursors) do contentprovider:Preload(v) --Currently does not work end]]
function swordUp() sp.Grip=CFrame.new(0,-1.7,0) end
function swordOut() sp.Grip=CFrame.new(0,-1.7,0)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/4,.4,0) end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) local currentlast=lastequipped if mouse==nil then print("Mouse not found") return end themouse=mouse mouse.Icon="http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID="..tostring(cursors["Center"]) mouse.Move:connect(function() local mp=mouse.X/mouse.ViewSizeX sp.MouseSide.Value=(mp<=1/3 and "Left") or (mp>=2/3 and "Right") or "Center" end) mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key=string.lower(key) if key=="l" or key=="t" or key=="g" then local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil then sp.Taunting.Value=true h.WalkSpeed=0 tauntanim=h:LoadAnimation(sp.Taunt) tauntanim:Play() wait(1) swordOut() wait(1.4) swordUp() wait(1) h.WalkSpeed=16 sp.Taunting.Value=false end end end) end sp.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
sp.MouseSide.Changed:connect(function() if themouse then themouse.Icon="http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID="..tostring(cursors[sp.MouseSide.Value]) end end)
sp.RunAnim.Changed:connect(function() local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") local anim=sp:FindFirstChild(sp.AnimToRun.Value) if anim and t and h then theanim=h:LoadAnimation(anim) if theanim and h.Health>0 then theanim:Play() if sp.AnimToRun.Value=="OverHeadSwing" then wait(.25) swordOut() wait(.5) swordUp() end end end end)
